ValidationRule.description: This validation rule prevents a user from filling in the wrong sizing fields (kWh or Cost) on the UAS.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( AND( Subscription_Type__c="kWh", ISCHANGED(Annual_Cost_Future_Rollup__c)=true, ISBLANK(Annual_Cost_Future_Rollup__c)=false) , AND( Subscription_Type__c="Electricity Cost ($)", ISCHANGED(Annual_kWh_Subscription_Future_Rollup__c)=true, ISBLANK(Annual_kWh_Subscription_Future_Rollup__c)=false) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You're using the wrong sizing fields. Look at the Subscription Type field. If it's kWh, use the Annual kWh sizing fields. If it's Electricity Cost ($), use the Annual Cost sizing fields. The subscription type is set by the Product on the Opportunity.
